application_type_full: Outline planning permission: Some matters reserved
description: Demolition of existing buildings; erection of 6 storey building comprising retail use on ground floor and community/church use on upper floors; erection of 6 storey building comprising 65 flats with basement parking on two levels (115 spaces in total); and construction of vehicular accesses off Russell Hill Road and Banstead Road (Outline application with only siting and means of access to be determined).
